Job Description
Work with development teams and product managers to ideate software solutions.
Design client-side and server-side architecture.
Build the front-end of applications through appealing visual design.
Develop and manage well-functioning databases and applications.
Test software to ensure responsiveness and efficiency.
Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade software.
Create security and data protection settings.
Build features and applications with a mobile responsive design.
Write Technical Documentation
Minimum Qualifications
Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role.
Experience in developing full-stack REST-ful web and mobile applications.
Knowledge of front-end languages is required (e.g. HTML/CSS, JavaScript).
Knowledge of front-end frameworks is preferred (React.js, Vue.js, Angular.js).
Knowledge of multiple back-end languages (e.g. PHP, Python, C++).
Knowledge of back-end frameworks is preferred (e.g. Laravel, Node.js, Django, Flask).
Familiarity with databases (SQL & NoSQL), web servers (NGINX, supervisor/hypervisors), and CI/CD tools are preferred.
Basic UI/UX knowledge and ability to design user-oriented features.
Excellent Communication and Teamwork Skills
Great Attention to Detail
Organizational Skills
An Analytical Mind
Degree in Computer Science, or relevant field.
Perks and Benefits
Employee Discounts
Flexitime
Maternity & Paternity Leave
Medical / Health Insurance
Work from Home

Job Description
Perform data exploration, data cleaning, data imputation, and feature engineering on unstructured and structured data.
Build the infrastructure for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) of data from a wide variety of data sources.
Develop and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture for training statistical and machine learning models such as regression and classification.
Develop and maintain evaluations to measure the effectiveness of training data. This includes measuring the capabilities of models on a variety of tasks and domains.
Collaborate with data scientists and machine learning engineers to develop a comprehensive data science/machine learning solution pipeline.
Minimum Qualifications
What you need to have (Minimum Qualifications):
Bachelor's degree from computer science or related fields, or equivalent software engineering experience.
Proficiency in Python programming language
Experience in dataset processing and feature engineering using tools such as Numpy, Pandas, and Scikit-Learn
Visualization skills using tools such as Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Bokeh
Understanding of deep learning frameworks such as Pytorch and TensorFlow
Understanding of SQL and NoSQL
Understands Hadoop / Spark / Kafka / Hive / Presto
Proficiency in source control i.e. Git
Preferred:
What would make you stand out from the crowd (Preferred Qualifications):
Deep understanding of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) concepts such as inheritance, delegation, and abstract class
Understanding of cloud-native technologies such as AWS, GCP, and Azure
Experience in using Docker
Experience in using AWS services such as S3, EC2, Glue, Sagemaker
Experience in AWS Step Function and/or AWS Lambda is even better
Proficiency in Scala and Java programming languages
Enjoy iterating quickly with research prototypes and learning new technologies
Perks and Benefits
Performance Bonus
Transportation Allowances
Work from Home
Other
WFH Allowance

BPJS Ketenagakerjaan
Medical Reimbursement

Job Description
Summary
As a Front-end Developer you will combine the art of design with the art of programming. Your Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.
Your responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works. In details :
Develop new user-facing features
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to backend
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders.
Minimum Qualifications
Candidates must possess at least a Diploma, Bachelorâ€™s Degree in Engineering (Computer/Telecommunication) or equivalent.
Required language(s): Indonesia, English.
Required skill(s): React, Git, HTML, JavaScript, CSS, jQuery
Have experience working with state management (Redux or Mobx)
Experience working with agile methodology (Scrum)
Familiar with React Native are preferred.
Experience in automated testing is preferred.
And on top of that, you are someone who is fun to work with, have a decent personality and kind hearted.
Perks and Benefits
Child Care Benefits
Paid Bereavement/Family Leave
Flexitime
Free Lunch or Snacks
Housing
Maternity & Paternity Leave
Medical / Health Insurance
Paid Holidays

Nice swimming pool and rice field view

Job Description

Design & Implement Monitoring tools for System, Application and Infrastructure.

What you need to have (Minimum Qualifications)
Excellent knowledge of Cloud Services such as AWS, GCP, Azure and Alibaba Cloud.
Excellent knowledge of automation IaC such as Ansible, CloudFormation, Terraform, Shell Scripting.
Excellent knowledge in Linux, Windows and Mac platforms.
Excellent knowledge in using NGINX.
Excellent knowledge in administration of different databases. Relational such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, MariaDB or NoSQL such as Elasticsearch, MongoDB, DynamoDB.

Several years of experience sharpening your capabilities in a specific field (web, mobile or backend)
Experience with using Ruby on Rails, Next.js and React.js
Additional breadth of experience in any other platforms
Able to articulate good software engineering practices
Experience applying software engineering practices in their teams
Experience managing stakeholders with good communication and coordination skills

Job Description
Work closely with the product and/or business team to sharpen product visions and requirements that focus on the user's needs
Collaborate with researchers to plan and conduct research in order to gather insights or validate hypothesis and design solutions
Collaborate with UI designers and UX writers to ensure the best quality of content and interface and are aligned with the design system
Interpret both quantitative and qualitative datas as parameters to be documented on the design decisions
Translate product's vision and requirements into a clear defined user journeys, end-to-end experiences and conceptual screen designs that includes but not limited to prototypes and wireframes
Showcase design works to design stakeholders
Drive collaboration using co-design & workshop processes involving different stakeholders to solve user problems
Work closely with Product Managers and Developers to ensure the proper designs are implemented into production
Mentor and coach associate designers to be able to deliver the best design implementation
Minimum Qualifications
Deep understanding and ability to implement Human Centered - Design Thinking process
Good story-telling ability to showcase design works and processes to the stakeholders
Good understanding of product metrics framework, ability to read and interpret data
Ability to conduct research such as Usability Testing, In-Depth Interview, Competitive Analysis, etc.
Good understanding and able to implement design principles (UX Laws, Gestalt Principles, Heuristic Usability, etc).
Have impactful design portfolios that demonstrate process and problem-solving skills
Minimum 2 years experience as UX Designer or similar roles
Able to use design tools such as Figma, Sketch, Invision, etc.
Up-to-date knowledge about trends and various aspects of digital product design
Proficiency in English both writing and verbally
Experience in mentoring or coaching is a plus
Perks and Benefits
Work from Home

Job Description
As SDET on Blibli.com, you will be part of our technology development team to ensure our product quality delivers the best e-commerce experience for our customers. You will be responsible for finding defects on the software and quality evaluation, in addition, you will be involved in the automated testing of software development to verify our product in an agile development process. As a mixture of software developer and quality engineer you will have the opportunity to learn the product or domain knowledge, take part in product and software design process, develop the end-user software requirements and test scenarios, evaluate the functional and usability of the product and learn on how to code and build the software test automation tools.
What you will do :
Create and execute test cases based on the product requirement
Write automation code for the designed test cases
Ensure the software quality by maintaining sanity and regression automation
Identify the product requirement in sprint grooming and sprint planning
Troubleshoot and prevent the issue in production and escalating any concerns that can potentially compromise product quality
Minimum Qualifications
Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering or Science from a reputable university (with min GPA 3.00)
Min. 2 years of related experience
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
A meticulous person with high attention to details
Good communication skills and able to work as a team as well as individually
Good working knowledge on using modern programming language/frameworks such as Java, Maven other frameworks
Good working knowledge of database technology (SQL, NoSQL)
Knowledge on testing REST API is a plus
Knowledge of UI testing and tracker is a plus
Knowledge of software quality assurance is a plus
Knowledge of test automation tools is a plus (Selenium, Appium, Cucumber)
(Open for Jakarta and Bandung Office)
